nodes.text: A'Lenba starport was located in the o'beki of A'Lenba on the planet Goroth Prime. Smaller than the main starport located at Graith, A'Lenba starport was similarly laid out with a large military area and smaller civilian and commercial zone.
Security for the military zone is provided by three to four K7 "Black Dagger" Security Droids. Two four-ship flight groups of TIE/LN starfighters were stationed at the starport.
